author: Special Correspondent
text:
A day after the Maharashtra government revised its policy of allotting government land at throwaway prices to stop the misuse of government land, the Maharashtra BJP on Wednesday demanded that the government should take back the land allotted to Associated Journals Ltd (AJL), which owns National Herald, by the Congress-NCP government at Bandra .

BJP spokesperson Madhav Bhandari said the state government had appointed a committee headed by IAS officer Gautam Chatterjee to probe any irregularities in the land allocation to AJL.
title: ‘Scrap land allotment to National Herald ’
